page.title: 08The Roman Catholic Church.
page.content: {The Roman Catholic Church}in Much Wenlock was built{30 years ago. On{Sunday, Mass}is celebrated at 9:00a.m. On{Saturday, Mass}is celebrated at 10:00a.m. and{during the {week, Mass}is celebrated at 9:15a.m. On Sunday about 30-50 people attend the service. Two people help in the Church service, they are called{Mass Servers.}Other people read in the Church when they are needed. On{Mondays,}groups of children are given instruction and learn about Communion and making their first Communion. The Roman Catholic Church in Much Wenlock is very small. There is no choir. There are few annual events and no organizations connected with the Church.
